mapper.select: select brd_id, title, writer, read_count, like_count, create_date, update_date from board order by brd_id desc limit #{offSet}, #{count}
mapper.insert: insert into board(title, contents, writer) values( #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer} )
insert into board_files(brd_id, file_name, stored_name, file_path, file_size) values(#{brdId}, #{fileName}, #{storedName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize} )
